trans-unit.source: Represents an expression that has a unary operator.
The following table summarizes the factory methods that can be used to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> that has a specific node type.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明可以用來建立處理站方法<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>的特定節點類型。

trans-unit.source: Factory Method
In addition, the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeUnary%2A> methods can also be used to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>.
These factory methods can be used to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> of any node type that represents a unary operation.
trans-unit.target: 這些 factory 方法，可以用來建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>的任何節點型別，表示將一元運算。

trans-unit.source: The parameter of these methods that is of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> specifies the desired node type.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法的參數型別的<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>指定想要的節點類型。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression> object that represents the reference conversion of a non-nullable integer expression to the nullable integer type.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression>物件，代表可為 null 的整數類型不可為 null 的整數運算式的參考轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the expression tree node can be reduced.
True if a node can be reduced, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點可以精簡，否則為 false，則為 true。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the expression tree node represents a lifted call to an operator.
<see langword="true" /> if the node represents a lifted call; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果節點表示消除的呼叫。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An operator call is *lifted* if the operator expects a non-nullable operand but a nullable operand is passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 運算子呼叫為*消除*如果運算子不可為 null 的運算元，但可為 null 的運算元傳遞給它。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the expression tree node represents a lifted call to an operator whose return type is lifted to a nullable type.
<see langword="true" /> if the operator's return type is lifted to a nullable type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果運算子的傳回型別已消除可為 null 的類型;否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An operator call is *lifted* if the operator expects a non-nullable operand but a nullable operand is passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 運算子呼叫為*消除*如果運算子不可為 null 的運算元，但可為 null 的運算元傳遞給它。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A> is `true`, the operator returns a nullable type and if the nullable operand evaluates to `null`, the operator returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.IsLiftedToNull%2A>是`true`，運算子會傳回 null 的型別，如果可為 null 的運算元判斷值為`null`，則運算子會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the implementing method for the unary operation.
The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> that represents the implementing method.
Returns the node type of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> that represents this expression.
Gets the operand of the unary operation.
An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the operand of the unary operation.
Reduces the expression node to a simpler expression.
The reduced expression.
If the `CanReduce` method returns true, this should return a valid expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果`CanReduce`方法會傳回 true，這應該會傳回有效的運算式。

trans-unit.source: This method can return another node which itself must be reduced.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以傳回其他本身必須精簡的節點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the static type of the expression that this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> represents.
The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Type" /> that represents the static type of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表運算式靜態類型的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.UnaryExpression.Operand" /> property of the result.
Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
